data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional, x64 (Falls Creator Update), Dell Latitude E5540
data.actual_result: Embed is limited to one line, and has a scrolling bar.
data.expected_result: Embed expands, and shows all text.
data.short_description: Embeds using 3 (the key next to 1 on Windows) Doesn't Expands
data.steps_to_repro: -Type in two or three paragraphs using the embed.-Press Enter, and observe -Can also take a look at bot-help channel where Dabbit gives an example of how to submit a bug.
